SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BuildHandler
The `BuildHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the /build command, which is used to create a new game.
Card
The `Card` class represents a game card used in Cards Against Mindera.
ChangeNameHandler
The `ChangeNameHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the /change_name command, which allows a client to change their username.
ChatGeneralHandler
The `ChatGeneralHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles general chat messages sent by clients.
Client
The `Client` class represents a client with a name, age, score, cards, and vote state.
ClientConnectionHandler
The `ClientConnectionHandler` class represents a handler for client connections in a server.
ClientLauncher
The `ClientLauncher` class is the entry point for launching the client application.
CommandHandler
The `CommandHandler` interface outlines the contract for classes that handle commands in the server-client communication.
CommandNotFoundHandler
The `CommandNotFoundHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles cases where an unrecognized or invalid command is received.
FillHandHandler
The `FillHandHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the command to fill a player's hand with white cards at the beginning of a game turn.
Game
The `Game` class represents a game of Cards Against Mindera.
GameCommands
The `GameCommands` enum represents the various game-related commands along with their corresponding handlers.
JoinGameHandler
The `JoinGameHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the command for a client to join an existing game.
ListGameHandler
The `ListGameHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the command for listing the currently running games.
ListPlayersHandler
The `ListPlayersHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and handles the command for listing online players.
LobbyCommands
The `LobbyCommands` enum represents various commands applicable before and after the game.
Messages
The `Messages` class provides static constants representing various messages used in the program.
NewGameHandler
The `NewGameHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for creating a new game.
PlayCardHandler
The `PlayCardHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for playing a card in the game.
QuitHandler
The `QuitHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for quitting the game.
Server
The `Server` class represents the main server for the Cards Against Mindera game.
ServerLauncher
The `ServerLauncher` class is responsible for launching the server for the GameName project.
ShowHandHandler
The `ShowHandHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for showing the hand of a player.
StartHandler
The `StartHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for starting a game.
TurnHandler
The `TurnHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for advancing the game turn.
VoteHandler
The `VoteHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for processing player votes during the voting phase of the game.
VoteStartHandler
The `VoteStartHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for initiating the voting phase of the game.
WhisperHandler
The `WhisperHandler` class implements the `CommandHandler` interface and represents the handler for sending private messages (whispers) between clients.
